name: Fluoxetine

dosing.adult_acute: 20 mg once daily, may increase after 1 week
dosing.notes: Can be dosed once daily due to long half-life; weekly formulation available (Prozac Weekly 90mg)

canadian_clinical.starting_dose: 10-20 mg once daily in the morning
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 10-20 mg every 1-2 weeks based on response
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: 80 mg/day; rarely exceed due to long half-life
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Start 20 mg daily; can increase to 40-60 mg within 2-3 weeks for severe depression
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 10-20 mg; slow titration recommended; reassess at 4-6 weeks

warnings: Black box warning: Increased suicidal thinking in children/adolescents/young adults
Long half-life (4-6 days) means 5+ weeks to steady state; drug interactions persist weeks after discontinuation
Significant CYP2D6 inhibitor - check drug interactions carefully
Lower risk of discontinuation syndrome due to long half-life
QTc prolongation risk at higher doses

cautions.hepatic: Reduce dose or increase dosing interval in cirrhosis
cautions.pregnancy: Pregnancy Category C; some data suggests increased risk of cardiac defects; weigh risks/benefits
